Containers.Description: The Channels DVR backend engine.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] Click the [b]Apply[/b] button at the bottom of the page.[br] There is no need to change the host mappings from their default values.[br][br] [b]/mnt/user/data/Media[/b] : This is where the ChannelsDVR folder exists for recordings to be stored. The DVR folder in the Channels Settings would then be: /mnt/user/data/Media/ChannelsDVR[br] [b]/channels-dvr[/b] : This is where the DVR application and configuration is stored. Recommend having this locally at /mnt/user/appdata/channels-dvr[br][br] [br]You need to have an NVIDIA card installed with a plugin with the Nvidia Drivers installed.[br] If you don't want to use NVIDIA remove the [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] in [b]"extra parameters"[/b] (switch on advanced view). If you want to specify a NVIDIA card, [br]copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b] for the card you want to use (replace [b]all[/b] with the [b]GPU UUID[/b]
